attributes.header-text: An official website of the United States government

components.content: Brief instructions for completing this form.
Standard Form 180 - Request Pertaining to Military Records. We'll help you request information from military service records.
Provide as much information as possible to help us locate the correct records.

attributes.alert-text: We use your Social Security Number to verify your identity. Your information is protected and encrypted.

components.content: Did this person retire from military service?
Has this person filed a claim with the VA?
Please provide information about military service. Include all service periods (active duty, reserve, and National Guard).
Select the documents or information you're requesting from the military records.

attributes.name: dd214
attributes.label: DD Form 214 or equivalent (Certificate of Release or Discharge)

components.content: This helps us provide the best response.

attributes.hint: This may help us provide a faster and more complete response
attributes.name: purposeExplanation
attributes.label: Please explain the purpose of your request

components.content: Please review your information before submitting your SF 180 request.

attributes.section1-content: Name: [Entered name] | Social Security: [Entered SSN] | Date of birth: [Entered date] | Place of birth: [Entered location]
attributes.section2-content: Branch: [Selected branch] | Service dates: [Entered dates] | Service type: [Selected type] | Last duty station: [Entered station]
attributes.section3-content: Documents: [Selected documents] | Purpose: [Selected purpose and explanation]
attributes.section4-content: Requester: [To be filled] | Relationship: [To be selected] | Mailing address: [To be provided]

attributes.name: relationship
attributes.label: Your relationship to the service member/veteran

components.content: I am the military service member or veteran
I am the deceased veteran's next-of-kin
I am the veteran's legal guardian

attributes.legend: Where should we send the records?

attributes.text: Your signature authorizes the release of the requested military records information.
attributes.heading: Signature required

attributes.name: authorization
attributes.label: I declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that the information in this request is true and correct, and I authorize the release of the requested information.

attributes.hint: This serves as your legal signature on this request
attributes.name: signature
attributes.label: Type your full name as signature
